Comments.Message: 2) I-Filter and Options filters could NOT be positive as they wouldn't work at all then, those are designed to take items out, even if other filters are trying to include them.
Really?  Seems like it's just a UI issue.  I could easily imagine "include ilvl 0-1", "include ilvl 2-187", etc.  Just check the desired ranges.

but they wouldn't physically do what they are doing if they were positive, eg- it wouldn't limit the other filters to those items ONLY, it would simply try to ADD any items that were 2-187 regardless of what the other filters were.

I think what you're saying is that this set of filters (iLvl and Options) are independent of the other filters.  That's true and is the desired behavior.  But the UI for them can still be phrased positively.    I'm not saying to change anything about how the filtering is done.  I just find that having to uncheck a "disable" checkbox is kind of a double negative: "don't not include these items" and gets me confused.

I agree, The new naming in 2.2.21 is much nicer and more to the point.

Me will work on me communication skills... Uhggg... Now me go find Jane...
